========================
BUILD OUTPUT DESCRIPTION
========================
This is a Basic Snake Game. You play with the Arrow Keys and you can restart with Enter, R, or F5
Slow mode starts when you press S
Medium mode starts when you press D
Fast mode starts when you press F

You can change the size of the box in which the snake moves around.
Default box size of 25 rows by 25 columns
Change size to 15 rows by 15 colums when you press 1
Change size to 20 rows by 20 colums when you press 2
Change size to 25 rows by 25 colums when you press 2
